name: heartpulse
description:
In heartpulse, you play as a little heart that must make it's way from one end of the screen to the other. However, with each jump, the heart beats, changing the world around you. Solve logic and reflex puzzles in this short puzzle platformer!

Controls:

A/Left arrow to move left

R/Right arrow to move right

Space/W/Up arrow to jump

R to restart a level

Hit a diamond or jump to change colors. (tip: if you hit a diamond while in the air, you get a second jump!)
